meanings.definition: The quality or state of being physically strong.
meanings.sent1: His strength helped him lift the heavy box.
meanings.sent2: She admired the strength of the weightlifter.
meanings.sent3: The strength of the tiny ant carrying the crumb was impressive.
meanings.sent4: The strength of the storm was evident in the howling winds.
meanings.sent5: The strength of the lion's roar echoed through the jungle.

meanings.definition: The capacity of an object or substance to withstand great force or pressure.
meanings.sent1: The strength of the bridge held up against the flood.
meanings.sent2: The strength of the metal ensured the durability of the structure.
meanings.sent3: The strength of the balloon surprised everyone as it didn't pop.
meanings.sent4: The strength of the rope was tested by the heavy load it carried.
meanings.sent5: The strength of the dam prevented the river from flooding the town.

meanings.definition: The emotional or mental qualities necessary in dealing with difficult or distressing situations.
meanings.sent1: Her strength of character helped her overcome the challenges.
meanings.sent2: He showed great strength in facing his fears.
meanings.sent3: The strength of her determination was unwavering.
meanings.sent4: The strength of their bond carried them through tough times.
meanings.sent5: The strength of her resolve shone brightly in adversity.
